oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Jewish war sufferers. Shall they plead in vain?
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This poster from World War I shows a Jewish woman and child sitting among the rubble of a community.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mayer, Louis, 1869-1969; American Jewish Join Distribution Committee
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: World War I and World War II Poster Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; Jewish refugees; Posters
